mapper.select: SELECT account, password, name, gender, email, phone, birthday, accountId, token, loginTime, createTime, modifyTime, loginIP FROM f_users WHERE account = #{account}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_users ( account, password, name, gender, email, phone, birthday, accountId, createTime, modifyTime ) VALUES ( #{account}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{accountId}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime} )
